channel.title: Deleting server on Server Status Page?
channel.description: Hello guys.. I was wondering how i delete my server on the status page :) Please reply asap!

item.title: Deleting server on Server Status Page?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

For now, yes. No serious server is going to not have a domain (they are free!) or change their domain.

Read full topic
item.source: Deleting server on Server Status Page?

item.title: Deleting server on Server Status Page?
item.dc:creator: @hadesflames hadesflames
item.description:
@hadesflames wrote:

So what happens to the people that don’t register domains? Or to people that change their domain for X reason? Screw them?

Read full topic
item.source: Deleting server on Server Status Page?

item.title: Deleting server on Server Status Page?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

There is a way to change your IP, register a domain and then you can change it anytime you like.

Read full topic
item.source: Deleting server on Server Status Page?

item.title: Deleting server on Server Status Page?
item.dc:creator: @hadesflames hadesflames
item.description:
@hadesflames wrote:

There should be a way to at least change your server’s IP.

On my server, I moved to a dedi, which changed the IP address for the server. My uptime went down the drain as I couldn’t update the IP, and I got 0 exposure. Thank god I managed to snag a sponsor spot, or I might still be facing the same problem…

Read full topic
item.source: Deleting server on Server Status Page?

item.title: Deleting server on Server Status Page?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

You can’t. It’s to protect against abuse from people deleting and reposting their server to get better uptime.

Read full topic
item.source: Deleting server on Server Status Page?
